Name: Deep Space
About the game: You are entrusted with the role of one of the elite captains, put on a high-tech mech suit suitable for travel into space and go on an exciting journey. Explore a galaxy full of adventures in the sci-fi game Deep Space and find new friends and acquaintances. Explore deep space, go to different planets and destroy dangerous enemies to save humanity from certain death. Features: - Eliminate the threat alone. Play a small campaign in single player mode. - Explore a new hostile world. - Embark on an exciting journey and save humanity.
